directions: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add tomatoes and garlic; season with salt, and cook, stirring often, until tomatoes release their juices, about 4 minutes.
Add cayenne and mint, if using, and cook, stirring often, until sauce is slightly thickened, about 5 minutes; season with salt. Let cool.
ingredients: 8 medium tomatoes (about 2 pounds), seeded, cut into 1/2" pieces
1 tablespoon dried mint or 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint (optional)
title: Lebanese Tomato "Salsa"
